description: The 14.40.33816 version of the C++ redistributable is currently unavailable for download, affecting systems that require this version to resolve the issues outlined in CVE-2024-43590. Users are still able to download version 14.40.33810, which does not address the latest vulnerabilities. The absence of the necessary version may lead to potential exploits or performance issues on applications that depend on updated C++ libraries. System administrators should monitor the availability of the 14.40.33816 version closely to ensure compliance and security. For reference, information about the vulnerability is documented under CVE-2024-43590 on Microsoft's update guide.
